abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column presents young, female Syrian refugee named Heba as example of people Republican presidential candidates are demonizing; describes threat of beating or beheading by Islamic State that Heba escaped by coming to United States and her relief at reaching safe haven; urges end of fear-mongering that presents unfair and unreasonable additional threat to refugees in United States.
lead_paragraph: A young woman who dreams of being an artist is still afraid after escaping her ISIS-controlled homeland — because she fears she will be sent back.

headline.main: Donald Trump, Meet a Syrian Refugee Named Heba

snippet: A young woman who dreams of being an artist is still afraid after escaping her ISIS-controlled homeland — because she fears she will be sent back.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
